| Key | Type | Default | Descriptions |
| --- | -----| ------- | ----------- |
| `[[engine]]` | -- | -- | The engine options. |
| `engine.name` | String | `postgres` | Use postgres. |
| `engine.path` | String | `/var/lib/postgresql/data` | -- |
| `[[proxy]]` | -- | -- | -- |
| `proxy.name` | String | `haproxy` | -- |
